context.project_overview: You are implementing Phase 7 of the OKR AI Agent - a conversational AI system that prevents activity-based OKRs and promotes outcome-focused thinking. This is the final phase focusing on deployment readiness and comprehensive documentation.

phase_objectives.primary_goal: Deploy production-ready OKR AI Agent with comprehensive documentation and operational procedures

success_criteria.criterion: Production deployment configuration complete with monitoring
Comprehensive user documentation and guides available
Administrator documentation and operational procedures complete
API documentation with examples and integration guides
Deployment automation and rollback procedures tested
Performance monitoring and alerting configured
Security hardening and compliance validation complete
User training materials and onboarding flows ready

technical_context.architecture: Local-first Node.js application with React frontend and Claude Sonnet 4 integration
technical_context.data_storage: SQLite database with JSON configuration files
technical_context.external_dependencies: Claude API (Anthropic), Node.js 20+, modern web browser
technical_context.security_model: Local data processing with API key management and input sanitization
technical_context.performance_targets: Sub-45-minute conversations, 3-second response times, 80+ quality scores

context.core_problem: The fundamental issue is that humans typically create activity-based OKRs (focused on delivering projects) rather than outcome-based OKRs (focused on achieving measurable business results). This agent must conversationally guide users away from "waterfall plans disguised as OKRs" toward meaningful objectives with quantifiable key results.

dialogue_phases.phase: Understanding business context and initial objective exploration
Converting activity language to outcome language

patterns.pattern: "Deliver project Z" → "Improve metric M by N%"
"Complete feature A" → "Increase user engagement by B%"
